author: lryan
msg: Implement the equivalent functionality of MakeRequestHandler using the REST/JSON-RPC handlers
This will be useful in osapi to simplify exposing HTTP fetching. Once PHP Shindig has the same support we can switch
io.js to use the new protocols.
Refactored handler binding to servlets to allow different APIs to be exposed at different paths.
